table.name: vtiger_visitingorder
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_visitingorder` ( `visitingorderid` int(11) NOT NULL, `subject` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `accountid` int(11) NOT NULL, `destination` varchar(100) default NULL, `contacts` varchar(100) default NULL, `purpose` varchar(100) default NULL, `startdate` varchar(100) default NULL, `starttime` varchar(100) default NULL, `enddate` varchar(100) default NULL, `endtime` varchar(100) default NULL, `extractid` int(11) default NULL, `accompany` varchar(100) default NULL, `examinestatus` varchar(100) default NULL, `examinesid` int(11) default NULL, `examinestime` varchar(100) default NULL, `followstatus` varchar(100) default NULL, `followid` int(11) default NULL, `followtime` varchar(100) default NULL, `remark` text, PRIMARY KEY (`visitingorderid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
